quotes.quote: Be sober, and to doubt prepense, These are the sinews of good sense.
A deep and sober concern to please God is the rarest of rarities.
Sober up, and you see and hear everything you'd been able to avoid hearing before.
To live sober is to die countless times!
Now i am sober and there's only the hangover and the memory of love.
Getting sober was one of the three pivotal events in my life, along with becoming an actor and having a child. Of the three, finding my sobriety was the hardest thing.
When you quit drinking you stop waiting.
The rule is simple: Be sober and temperate, and you will be healthy.
The worst thing about some men is that when they are not drunk they are sober.
Good God, if our civilization were to sober up for a couple of days it'd die of remorse on the third.
It is a sober truth that people who live only to amuse themselves work harder at the task than most people do in earning their daily bread.
My mind may be sober, but my confidence is high!
A sober mind, an unemotional heart and a positive attitude are key for success.
Getting sober was the single bravest thing I've ever done and will ever do in my life.
It's a great advantage not to drink among hard drinking people.
You have no idea how long a year is until you're stone sober.
Being sober for so many years is getting interesting.

Getting sober just exploded my life. Now I have a much clearer sense of myself and what I can and can't do. I am more successful than I have ever been. I feel very positive where I never did before, and I think that's all a direct result of getting sober.
As you get older, you kind of take a more sober view of life.
Being sober on a bus is, like, totally different than being drunk on a bus.
The sober comfort, all the peace which springs from the large aggregate of little things.
I personally believe this: We have only today; yesterday's gone and tomorrow is uncertain. That's why they call it the present. And sobriety really is a gift for those who are willing to receive it.
When I got sober, I thought giving up was saying goodbye to all the fun and all the sparkle, and it turned out to be just the opposite. That's when the sparkle started for me.
It looks different when you're sober; I thought I had twice as much furniture.
Sober perseverance is more effective than enthusiastic emotions, which are all too capable of being transferred, with little difficulty, to something different each day.
Liberty and democracy are eternal enemies, and every one knows it who has ever given any sober reflection to the matter.
To the sober person adventurous conduct often seems insanity.
The second, sober thought of the people is seldom wrong, and always efficient.
